_header: Marius was a good man from Cappadocia I-come
Subjects: Marius, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Marius, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Marius was a good man fram capadosye I comewit his wif & his to
                    sonys to þe borw of rome…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu þat is in heuene þou art so fre &
                    hendeGraunte vs þat we mote alle þedir wende
Bod779.Attributed Title:
Seint marius & his vif & his to sonis (f.
                    217v)
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 382-4.
